section.title: Creating a group
section.para: When you create a group in Symantec Security Cloud, you have to apply a security policy to it. You can use the default security policy or create a new one before you create the group.

step.para: In Symantec Security Cloud, go to the Groups, Users, and Devices page, select the plus icon, and then select Create Group.
In the Create Group window, enter the group name and description, and then click or tap Next.

section.para: To add existing users to a group, select Add Users to Group from the context menu.
See How groups manage policy flow in Symantec Security Cloud
